short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your Notion cover image Slimer, which will make your page appear wider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension installed, when you open Notion in your browser, the cover image at the top of the page will be made thinner.
This allows you to display the page wider and improves visibility.
